## cilium-operator shell

Connect to the shell

```
cilium-operator shell [command] [args]... [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                     help for shell
      --shell-sock-path string   Path to the shell UNIX socket (default "/var/run/cilium/shell.sock")
```
